name: 1Search with Existing Product
actions: Assert that '1 item(s)' is displayed in the page

name: 2Login with valid data
actions: Assert that 'My Account' is displayed on the page

name: 3User Registration with existing email
actions: Assert that 'Continue' is displayed on the page

name: 4Search Product Page
actions: Assert that 'iMac' OR 'error is displayed on the page

name: 5Login with incorrect email
actions: Assert that 'warning' is displayed on the page

name: 6Checkprice
actions: Assert that '241.99' and 'Ex Tax: 199.99' are displayed in the page

name: 7CheckCart
actions: Assert that 'Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1' is displayed in the page

name: 8View product details
actions: Assert that the link 'Description' is displayed on the page
Assert that the link 'Reviews (0)' is displayed on the page
Assert that the link 'Specification' is displayed on the page

name: 9Check Shopping cart
actions: Assert that 'Your shopping cart is empty!' is displayed on the page

name: 10sitemap
actions: Assert that 'Site Map' is displayed on the page
Assert that 'Information' is displayed on the page
